__TOC__

This document is a list of all the current Ubuntu community pages relating to the iPhone. It may be removed or serve as the basis for a Main Page for iPhone-related information. The intention is to streamline the current information by merging/moving documents

-- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:jimlepp]]</nowiki> 
* <nowiki>[[PortableDevices-iPhone]]</nowiki> - Ubuntu 10.04, 9.10 and <=9.04 
* <nowiki>[[PortableDevices-iphone troubleshooting]]</nowiki> - Duplicates iPhone page except Firmware 1.1.3/MNPlight sections and Syncing iPhones and iPods Touch w/ Firmware 2.x
* <nowiki>[[PortableDevices-syncing your iphone via cable]]</nowiki> - First two sections duplicate main iPhone page. Last two sections are unique: 'Speed' and 'Copying photos to the iPhone or iPod Touch'
* <nowiki>[[PortableDevices-iPhone-iTunesVirtualBox]]</nowiki> - Sync music using built-in iPod application

** <nowiki>[[iPhone converting and watching videos]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[Retrieving and setting the Firewire GUID (FirewireGuid)]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[syncing your calendar and notes]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[iphone passwordless access]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[phone wireless]]</nowiki>
** Deleted content and set up redirect to Iphone connecting wireless
